title: USWE’s Epic Series All Mountain hydration packs wrangle your dancing monkey
content:
While many riders are experimenting with on-bike storage, there are still plenty who prefer the convenience of a backpack for hauling water, trailside tools, and snacks. Sweden’s USWE has just released their EPIC Series All Mountain packs, and they’re looking to win riders over with their No Dancing Monkey strap system. There are three packs […]

The post USWE’s Epic Series All Mountain hydration packs wrangle your dancing monkey appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Steve Fisher
